Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add LLM MBTI test program

CLI tool that runs MBTI personality tests on LLMs via the OpenMBTI MCP
server using OpenRouter as the LLM gateway.

Features:
- Connect to OpenMBTI MCP server (Streamable HTTP transport)
- Support any model available on OpenRouter
- Run multiple test iterations for statistical analysis
- Save detailed results to JSON (all Q&A pairs, MBTI type, scores)
